comment: She is amazing! Class is interesting, lots of work but it is meaningful work that you will use. She is very responsive to emails and grading and gives great feedback.

This was an online course taught in modules through video segments, slide decks, and a required textbook. Not a heavy course load, and well-paced. Instructor is flexible on group discussion and participation and open to students. Highly recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Graded by few things
